job_details.Functieomschrijving:
At Syngenta, we believe every employee has a role to play in safely feeding the world and taking care of our planet. To support that challenge, the Vegetables & Flowers Seeds Development team is currently seeking a Pipeline Tool Developer located in Durham, NC. Role may also be based at our Enkhuizen, Netherlands location., Role purpose: Syngenta is currently seeking a full stack developer with strong technical and interpersonal skills to collaborate with multidisciplinary teams in delivering innovative and robust analytical tools which enables product advancement and placement for Vegetables & Flowers Seeds Development, Syngenta., * Designing, building, and maintaining data pipelines to support the development and deployment of machine learning models and advanced analytics.
     * Implementing infrastructure as code and automating and streamlining data operations with a focus on cloud-based data processing.
     * Designing and developing end-to-end machine learning pipelines and analytical software.
     * Supporting the design and development of user interface for web-based applications to enable data visualization.
     * Implementing, and maintaining continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.
     * Building application containerization and orchestration within a cloud environment.
     * Monitoring and optimizing the performance of deployed models by implementing best practices for logging, monitoring, and error handling to triage issues.
     * Managing software deployment and configuration in non-production and production environments.
job_details.full_text:
Pipeline Tool Developer

At Syngenta, we believe every employee has a role to play in safely feeding the world and taking care of our planet. To support that challenge, the Vegetables & Flowers Seeds Development team is currently seeking a Pipeline Tool Developer located in Durham, NC. Role may also be based at our Enkhuizen, Netherlands location., Role purpose: Syngenta is currently seeking a full stack developer with strong technical and interpersonal skills to collaborate with multidisciplinary teams in delivering innovative and robust analytical tools which enables product advancement and placement for Vegetables & Flowers Seeds Development, Syngenta., * Designing, building, and maintaining data pipelines to support the development and deployment of machine learning models and advanced analytics.
     * Implementing infrastructure as code and automating and streamlining data operations with a focus on cloud-based data processing.
     * Designing and developing end-to-end machine learning pipelines and analytical software.
     * Supporting the design and development of user interface for web-based applications to enable data visualization.
     * Implementing, and maintaining continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.
     * Building application containerization and orchestration within a cloud environment.
     * Monitoring and optimizing the performance of deployed models by implementing best practices for logging, monitoring, and error handling to triage issues.
     * Managing software deployment and configuration in non-production and production environments.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the design, building, and maintenance of data pipelines for ML models and advanced analytics, along with the implementation of end-to-end ML pipelines and analytical software. It also highlights MLOps practices such as CI/CD, containerization, orchestration, monitoring, and deployment in production environments. While there is mention of user interfaces for data visualization, the core focus remains on the data and model lifecycle, aligning with the 'ML Engineer' profile.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Designing, building, and maintaining data pipelines to support the development and deployment of machine learning models and advanced analytics' directly describes data engineering activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Designing, building, and maintaining data pipelines to support the development and deployment of machine learning models and advanced analytics

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Implementing infrastructure as code and automating and streamlining data operations with a focus on cloud-based data processing' describes data engineering tasks related to infrastructure and automation.
job_tasks.phrase: Implementing infrastructure as code and automating and streamlining data operations with a focus on cloud-based data processing

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Designing and developing end-to-end machine learning pipelines and analytical software' indicates the creation and implementation of ML models and analytical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: Designing and developing end-to-end machine learning pipelines and analytical software

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Supporting the design and development of user interface for web-based applications to enable data visualization' points to software development for user-facing applications, specifically for data visualization.
job_tasks.phrase: Supporting the design and development of user interface for web-based applications to enable data visualization

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Implementing, and maintaining continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines' is a core MLOps activity.
job_tasks.phrase: Implementing, and maintaining continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Building application containerization and orchestration within a cloud environment' describes key MLOps practices for deployment and management.
job_tasks.phrase: Building application containerization and orchestration within a cloud environment

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Monitoring and optimizing the performance of deployed models by implementing best practices for logging, monitoring, and error handling to triage issues' details essential MLOps responsibilities for production systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Monitoring and optimizing the performance of deployed models by implementing best practices for logging, monitoring, and error handling to triage issues

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Managing software deployment and configuration in non-production and production environments' is a direct MLOps task related to release management.
job_tasks.phrase: Managing software deployment and configuration in non-production and production environments
